questions.question: According to studies, as many as (__________) of children in the United States have experienced some sort of bullying.
What is another name for online bullying?
Which one is an example of indirect bullying?
Bullying is okay if no one sees you do it.
questions.result: NO - Nobody deserves to be bullied.

questions.question: Posting nasty pictures or messages about others in blogs or on websites is a form of cyberbullying.
You should help other kids who are bullied.
If someone at school is calling you bad names, you should hit them.
questions.result: NO - Tell your teacher and/or parents.

questions.question: Sometimes kids are picked on because they look different.
Sometimes kids are bullied because they don't have many (__________).
